features: MENS FACE WASH FORMULA: This is an advanced, deep-cleaning face scrub for men - a mens natural face wash formula that attacks dirt, excess oil & grime. Use this exfoliating face wash for men to help eliminate breakouts & acne without drying you out.

MULTI-PURPOSE BENEFITS: An energizing daily face wash for men that covers all the bases for a revitalized complexion. With plant-based exfoliants that gently remove impurities & foaming gel that reduces oils & dirt for a complete mens face wash.

HIGHLY EFFECTIVE FORMULA: A non-drying mens daily face wash is the perfect addition to any man's skincare routine. It helps prevent congestion & the signs of aging. The gentle exfoliants help remove dead skin cells & prep the skin for a clean shave.

A FACIAL WASH MEN TRUST: Ingredients borrowed from the outdoors release potent vitamins and minerals: Organic Aloe Vera, Organic Rosehip, Tea Tree, Jojoba & Burdock Root. A natural mens face wash for dry skin that leaves you feeling fresh and clean.

A MENS FACE CLEANSER FOR ALL AGES & MOST SKIN TYPES: Normal, sensitive, oily, dry, combo and acne-prone complexions. Great for your mustache, beard, back, under hair and neck area. A premium daily face cleanser is essential for every man's routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good face product
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husband. He us enjoying using it and I can seriously tell that his skin looks better with this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I first purchased this face wash after doing some research on the best cleanser for black men. This product came up on multiple lists. I took the plunge because I was tired of dealing with cheaper brands and was finally looking for a good, adult product. I like my decision with this. It has a slight smell, but it's pleasant. There are exfoliating beads that make me feel like it's doing extra work on my behalf. The 8 oz bottle lasts me for months and I only use a small dollop a day. I'm going to be sticking with this product for the foreseeable future.

reviews.reviewText: great product! perfect balance exfoliating and cleaning, and you only need a drop for your whole face!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleans, but doesn't impress.
reviews.reviewText: How to review this product and compete with all of the witty and rather clever reviews.... Heck, after reading the reviews on this product, I was half-way convinced this product would change my life. Most of the reviews were compensated and if they were unhappy, they still made waiver statements as though a lawyer coached them.Now, I want to start by saying I waited a little more than a week to write a review because my first impression was to pack this stuff back up and send it back. After a few days of use, I changed my view because what are we talking about here? It's a face wash.Does it clean? Yup.Does your skin feel decent after use? You betcha.After using this product, do you wake up in a mansion with the title "Supermodel Rock Star"? Not a chance, but don't expect that from a bottle of face wash....The bottle is very cheap and due to the density of the product, you will have to pump the dispenser incessantly to prime it enough to actually work. There isn't a strong scent and it's not distinctive by any means. The "exfoliate" portion refers to the not so "micro-rocks" that do scrub per say, but are not in high enough quantities to do much of anything. You basically just push them around on your face and seem like ingredients to hype the label, not functionality. Speaking of the label, I feel as though the label is well marketed to appeal to all. "Organic ingredients, foaming exfoliator, fuel." Yeah it has those ingredients and they make sure to spell it out all over the label, but they seem to be more of an advertisement. Just didn't get the result that was claimed.Overall, it's a nice soap, but I think it's priced much too high. I purchased for about half the retail price and I feel that's still too high. It's new, so you're not paying for the name and clearly it wasn't spent on the bottle. I will not be purchasing an additional bottle, even with the advertised discount for a good review, but I'll finish the one I have as it still does its job...it cleans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well, smell not so great
reviews.reviewText: The product works well and keeps my skin clean and moisturized. Only issue is the scrub smells like Lemon Clorox wipes.
Amazing premium quality product, I use it everyday and add moisturizer right after. Been using it for a month. Will definitely buy again if the product remains the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 29, 2016
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this morning and before going to bed for a few days and so far it has been working without any outbreaks of pimples/rashes on my face. The only downside I can say is the price as its pricey compared to some other products but in my opinion I think its worth it. Recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Its simply the best face wash I have ever used
reviews.reviewText: Its simply the best face wash I have ever used. My acne cleared up within two weeks of using it. Have been using it for three months now and still marvel at how wonderfully it works. Going to order my second bottle now :))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 19, 2017
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect balance of cleanser and scrub. I have sensitive skin and this does not irritate it in the slightest. It leaves a smooth face and is perfect to prepare your face for a shave or just to use as a daily cleanser. Very natural and very effective.
Super face wash. Costly but lasts very long. Its scrub cum face wash so one not need to buy scrub separately. Definitely recommended for all skin types.
